## Reading

This week, to help you gain fluency with R, you will read a chapter from Hadley 
Wickham's excellent book [*R for Data Science*](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/). 

Depending on what you find easier, you can either
[read the chapter online](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/eda.html) or follow
along with the primer below. Both cover the same material.
